qns-qig-mapping.questionnotmovednote: The Question can be seen after the closure of the Examination.

create-qig.errorqigempty: QIG Name should not be Empty.
create-qig.errormantryquesn: Mandatory Questions should not be Zero.
create-qig.mantryquesnnotgreaterthantotl: Mandatory Questions should not be greater than the total Questions.
create-qig.totlmrksofbothquestions: Total marks of the selected Questions are different.
create-qig.selectedblaksbelngtodiffentquestion: The selected blanks belongs to different Question.
create-qig.pgedesc: Create QIG Page allows to create a new QIG by providing the QIG Name, Question Type and number of Mandatory Questions. Here Question Type can be of Composition and Non- Composition.
create-qig.editpgedesc: Edit QIG Page allows to edit existing QIG where AO is able to edit QIG Name, number of Mandatory Questions and allows to add or remove the question(s) in QIG.

manage-qig.title: Manage QIG's
manage-qig.mandtryError: Mandatory Question should not be zero.
manage-qig.pgedesc: In Manage QIG page all the QIG's of the marking project are listed with the details of Total no. of QIG's, Total no. of Questions, Total Tagged Questions, Total Un-Tagged Questions and Total Mandatory Questions. In this page there is an option to Create/Edit QIG, Finalise QIG setup and QIG's Reset. Once QIG setup finalised then QIG's Reset option is available.
manage-qig.onceufinalizedtagoruntag: Once you finalise then you cannot move or tag/untag any Questions.
manage-qig.agreetermsconditions: I agree these terms and conditions.
manage-qig.notemessage: Note: Cannot set as finalise, kindly find the reason as mentioned below
manage-qig.questionsnottaggedtoanyqig: Question's not tagged to any QIG, please configure and then set as finalise.
